column2: Here knights face off against one another in jousting tournaments and other chivalrous competitions
Housecarl are the traditional body guards of the HoHo nobility, often armed with axes and heavy armor.
The koridain Goldpikes are renowned for their skills with pikes and often gold colored cuiresses.
It is here that fearsome war elephants are raised and trained
Among the Morians the longbow and archery are things of pride, usually most Morians are trained in archery first and then other forms of combat.
It is here that rangers, infantry skilled in combat in woodland combat, are trained
It is here that individuals skilled in swordsmanship are trained and housed.
Port Town has been a haven for mercenaries since it was settled by humans. Most savy nobles can easily find a way to exploit these people in times of need

Ordon Herdsmen are all skilled horsemen many of whom are recruited from skilled goat herders and hands. When called to battle their tactics reflects that of  herding Ordon Goats and often said to be more stuborn than the goats they once herded.

The Chilfos Warriors of the Frozen Isle are renowned for the shinning scale armor and polar bear furs. Every warrior obtained their furs after slaying an Icy Plain Bear armed with only an axe and some Icy Plain Bird meat.

The magic enclaves of Kasuto are places of learning where one can learn how to perfom magic. Most however do not learn enough magic before they become too old to fight so must use their magic from behind the frontlines.
The Rivermen are heavily armed militia originating in Saria.
The Crow Warriors are a cult of horse bound warriors from the Eldin Plateaus. Most warriors ride into battle adorned in leather armor decorated with bones and feathers.

The sapper armory is a massive reinforced building, usually far away from the main building, housing large amounts of explosives. Those that use these weapons are usually carefully trained in making and detonating the contents
It is here that stone soldiers, large golem like warriors are built and maintained.
The Sheikah are renowned for their assassins and it is here that they train.
Most gerudo live in fortresses cities frequently are little more than fortresses with larger markets. It is in blockhouses that most gerudo live
The gerudo are proud of their horses and prefer to fight from afar when they can.
After centuries of inhabitation by the wind tribe the walls and ground have been saturated with wind magic to the point that the very land begins to float above ground.
With the aid of piccori the Wind Tribe can create complex machanised warriors
An additional keep in which the castles lords keeps and trains his mage servents
It is here that the keaton warriors are taught more advanced techniques.
It is here that young warriors are taught advance combat manuvers
The races created by Demise often have a easy time finding a reason to fight. What more reason does one need to fight than land.
The races created by Demise often have a easy time finding a reason to fight. What more reason does one need to fight than land.
The human tribes have always had a low respect of the races of monsters. Takeing land from the monsters is usually enough justification for a war.
Often ambitious or mad Hylians have justified wars by the fact that the Hylians are the goddesses chosen people.
was abandoned in the wild at a very young age by $KILLER$
The title Biggoron is given to an individual who is the largest in his tribe, usually towering above all other gorons.
The title Midgoron is given to an individual who is the second largest in his tribe, usually only shorter than the biggoron.
A title traditionally given to those that have performed their duties well beyond expectations, usually acts of bravery in the face of certain death. Usually given to one no matter their rank.
The title Immun is usually given to those who perform extra duties, whether it is a duty that is usually beneath or above their rank.
The Imagifer is the title given to the one who carries the Dox's Legion's Standard or an image of the Dox in the case of the more vein Dox.
The title of mighty is given to the strongest or most skilled with the sword. There are cases when it is given to someone shown to be extremly skilled in tactics.
